Description:
Detects that network ACL entries have been added to a route table which could indicate that new attack vectors have been opened up in the AWS account.


Author: jamesc-grafana
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Network ACL Entry Added
Query: sourcetype='aws-cloudtrail' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'ec2.amazonaws.com' and eventname = 'createnetworkaclentry'
